posts.claim: New study shows that drinking coffee reduces risk of heart disease by 50% and can prevent diabetes in adults over 40
posts.summary: Claims about coffee's health benefits based on recent research from Harvard Medical School

verification.message: Study exists but benefits may be overstated in the original claim
verification.reasoning: Found original study from Harvard Medical School but the effect size is smaller than claimed. The 50% reduction figure appears to be exaggerated.
verification.claim_text: New study shows that drinking coffee reduces risk of heart disease by 50% and can prevent diabetes in adults over 40

posts.claim: Government plans to implement mandatory digital ID cards for all citizens starting next month
posts.summary: Viral social media post claiming imminent implementation of digital ID requirements

verification.message: No official government announcement or legislation supports this claim
verification.reasoning: Extensive search of government websites, official press releases, and legislative records shows no evidence of such a program. This appears to be misinformation.
verification.claim_text: Government plans to implement mandatory digital ID cards for all citizens starting next month

posts.claim: Local weather station reports unusual temperature readings suggesting climate manipulation
posts.summary: Post suggesting conspiracy about weather modification based on temperature data

verification.message: Insufficient evidence to support weather manipulation claims
verification.reasoning: While temperature anomalies were recorded, they fall within normal variation ranges. No credible evidence supports weather manipulation theories.
verification.claim_text: Local weather station reports unusual temperature readings suggesting climate manipulation

posts.claim: Breaking: Major tech company announces they will stop using AI in their products due to safety concerns
posts.summary: Viral news about a tech company abandoning AI technology completely

verification.message: Company announced AI safety improvements, not complete abandonment
verification.reasoning: The company did make an announcement about AI, but it was about implementing new safety measures and ethical guidelines, not stopping AI use entirely.

titles: Official Company Statement on AI Ethics

verification.claim_text: Breaking: Major tech company announces they will stop using AI in their products due to safety concerns

posts.claim: Scientists discover new species of deep-sea creature with bioluminescent properties in Pacific Ocean
posts.summary: Scientific discovery announcement about new marine life with unique light-producing abilities

verification.message: Discovery confirmed by multiple scientific institutions
verification.reasoning: Published research paper confirms the discovery. Multiple marine biology institutions have verified the findings and the species has been officially catalogued.
verification.claim_text: Scientists discover new species of deep-sea creature with bioluminescent properties in Pacific Ocean
